idea-plugin.name: SwingExplorer Integration
idea-plugin.description:
The plug-in integrates SwingExplorer into IntelliJ IDEA. SwingExplorer is a tool for Java Swing application debugging. Usage instructions are available here

The plug-in was contributed by Piotr Mlocek
idea-plugin.change-notes: Incorporates Swing Explorer 1.6.0, works with IntelliJ 14+.
